explains: n. 裸体，裸露；裸体画（或雕像等）

sentences.en: It was the first show to use the F-word and show nudity on stage.
sentences.cn: 这是第一个使用脏字并且裸体上台的演出。

sentences.en: The committee claimed that there was too much nudity on television.
sentences.cn: 委员会指出电视里的裸体镜头太多。

sentences.en: Nudity is something I can deal with.
